content: निवात {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [निवृत्तोनिरुद्धो वा वातोऽस्मात्] {@--1@} Sheltered from the wind, not windy, calm; <ls>R. 3. 17</ls>; <ls n="R.">19. 42.</ls> {@--2@} Unhurt, uninjured, unobstructed. {@--3@} Safe, secure. {@--4@} Well-armed, accoutred in strong mail. --तः {@--1@} A refuge, dwelling, an asylum. {@--2@} An impenetrable coat of mail. --तं {@--1@} A place sheltered from the wind; निवातनिष्कंपमिव प्रदीपं <ls>Ku. 3. 48</ls>; <ls>Ki. 14. 37</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 52</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 17</ls>; <ls>Bg. 6. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Absence of wind, calm, stillness; <ls>R. 12. 36.</ls> {@--3@} A secure spot. {@--4@} A strong armour.
